Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.name: code
Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.abstract: The Snapscreen-specific channel code for this TV channel

Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.name: grabbed
Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.abstract: Whether this tv channel is grabbed by Snapscreen and available for snapping

Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.name: logoURL
Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.abstract: An optional link to a channel logo

Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.name: posterURL
Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.abstract: An optional link to a channel poster image

Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.name: liveImageURL
Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.abstract: Optional URL for a live image of the currently epg unit on this channel

Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.name: liveImageURLSecured
Structs/TvChannel.html#/s:19SnapscreenFr.abstract: Determines whether an access token is necessary when fetching the liveImageURL

Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: startTime
Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: The queued start date of the event

Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: endTime
Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: The queued end date of the event

Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: dataProviderCode
Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: Provider code for the sport data - e.q. Betradar

Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: dataProviderMatchId
Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: Id for this event for the given sportDataProvider - e.g. Betradar MatchID

Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: competitors
Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: Information about the competitors in this event

Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: tvChannel
Structs/SportEvent.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: Tv channel this event is presented on

Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/s:19Snapsc.name: competitorId
Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/s:19Snapsc.abstract: An optional competitorId - refers to an entry of competitors of a SnapOddsResult

Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/s:19Snapsc.name: sportsBook
Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/s:19Snapsc.abstract: Optional name of the sports book this offer is from. Only set for bestOffers

Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/s:19Snapsc.name: bestOutcome
Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/s:19Snapsc.abstract: Optional boolean if this outcome is the best available outcome of the given type

Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/s:19Snapsc.name: redirectURL
Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/s:19Snapsc.abstract: The optional direct (web) redirect URL to this outcome

Structs/SnapOddsSportBook.html#/s:19Snap.name: redirectURL
Structs/SnapOddsSportBook.html#/s:19Snap.abstract: The direct (web) redirect URL to the bets for this provider

Structs/SnapOddsPlayer.html#/s:19Snapscr.name: teamId
Structs/SnapOddsPlayer.html#/s:19Snapscr.abstract: The id of the team of this player - refers to the id of a SnapOddsCompetitor

Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/s:19Snapscr.name: competitors
Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/s:19Snapscr.abstract: Information about the competitors in this event

Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/s:19Snapscr.name: players
Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/s:19Snapscr.abstract: Information about the players in this event

Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/s:19Snapscr.name: sportsBooks
Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/s:19Snapscr.abstract: A list of providers that offer bets

Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/s:19Snapscr.name: bestOffers
Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/s:19Snapscr.abstract: The best offers available. Each offer might be by a different odds provider (sports book)

Structs/SnapOddsResult.html.name: SnapOddsResult
Structs/SnapOddsResult.html.abstract: Represents the odds for a sport event

Structs/SnapOddsCompetitor.html.name: SnapOddsCompetitor
Structs/SnapOddsCompetitor.html.abstract: Represent a competitor for a sport event

Structs/SnapOddsPlayer.html.name: SnapOddsPlayer
Structs/SnapOddsPlayer.html.abstract: Represent a player for a sport event

Structs/SnapOddsSportBook.html.name: SnapOddsSportBook
Structs/SnapOddsSportBook.html.abstract: Represents the offers of an odds provider

Structs/SportEventCompetitor.html.name: SportEventCompetitor
Structs/SportEventCompetitor.html.abstract: Represents a competitor in a sport event

Protocols/SnapscreenSnapDelegate.html#/s.name: snapscreenSnapViewController(_:didSnapSportEvent:)
Protocols/SnapscreenSnapDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Called when the snap view controller snaps a sport event. Snapping will automatically stop since we assume that you will navigate to a new screen. If you want to continue snapping, call continueSnapping on the SnapViewController.

Classes/SnapViewController.html#/s:19Sna.name: forSportsMedia(configuration:)
Classes/SnapViewController.html#/s:19Sna.abstract: Creates and returns a new SnapViewController for Sports Media Mode. So after snapping, the OddsResultsViewController for the snapped sport event is presented.

Classes/SnapViewController.html#/s:19Sna.name: forSportsOperator(configuration:snapDelegate:)
Classes/SnapViewController.html#/s:19Sna.abstract: Creates and returns a new SnapViewController for Sports Operator Mode. So after snapping, the provided SnapscreenSnapDelegate is informed about the snapped sport event and you choose how to proceed.

Classes/SnapViewController.html#/s:19Sna.name: continueSnapping()
Classes/SnapViewController.html#/s:19Sna.abstract: Continue snapping when snapping was stopped due to sport event result being delivered to SnapscreenSnapDelegate in Sports Operator Mode.

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: SnapscreenAuthenticationChangedNotification
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: Notification that is sent out when the authentication changes - afterwards it is advised to fetch the updated value of authorizationHeader in case it is used

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: country
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: The country code the user is in. Affects the results that are found when snapping. Defaults to AT.

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: usState
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: The US state the user is in. Possibly affects the odds results provided. Defaults to nil.

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: snapUIConfiguration
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: UI Configuration - preconfigured with default Snapscreen values - modify as desired

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: oddsUIConfiguration
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: Game Odds Display UI configuration - preconfigured with default Snapscreen valeus - modify as desired

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: setup(withClientId:clientSecret:environment:)
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: Initialize Snapscreen with your clientID and clientSecret and one of the predefined environments

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: setup(withClientId:clientSecret:backendURL:)
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: Initialize Snapscreen with your clientID and clientSecret and a custom backend URL

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: getOddsForSportEvent(withId:completion:)
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: Fetches the odds for a sport event with the provided id. If no results are found (either because sport event does not exist or no odds are found, the completion closure is called with a nil result

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: authorizationHeader
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: The current authorization header used by Snapscreen. Set as header ‘Authorization’ in case you access any secured Snapscreen backend endpoints

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.name: currentTimestamp
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/s:19SnapscreenF.abstract: The current timestamp as synced by Snapscreen - useful for synchronizing exact timestamps determined during snapping

Classes/SnapscreenQuadrangle.html#/c:@M@.name: init(point1:point2:point3:point4:)
Classes/SnapscreenQuadrangle.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Constructor for a quadrangle - intented to be used only by Snapscreen internally

Classes/SnapscreenFingerprintResult.html.name: init(fingerprintData:preprocessedImageData:preprocessedImageWidth:preprocessedImageHeight:preprocessedImageChannels:quadrangle:timestamp:)
Classes/SnapscreenFingerprintResult.html.abstract: Constructor for a fingerprinting result - intented to be used only by Snapscreen internally

Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.name: timestamp
Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.abstract: The unix timestamp (milliseconds since 1.1.1970) that represents the recognized frame

Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.name: snapscreenTimestampDelta
Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.abstract: A relative delta to the current snapscreen timestamp - use this for very exact syncing with the backend by adding to Snapscreen.instance.currentTimestamp

Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.name: sportEvent
Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.abstract: The event this result is associated to - only set if event is found

Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.name: tvChannel
Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.abstract: The channel this result is associated to - only set if no event was found as fallback

Classes/SnapscreenUILabelWithTextConfigu.name: textColor
Classes/SnapscreenUILabelWithTextConfigu.abstract: Text color to use for the label

Classes/SnapscreenUILabelConfiguration.h.name: textColor
Classes/SnapscreenUILabelConfiguration.h.abstract: Text color to use for the label

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapHintText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Snap Hint/Instruction shown in the snap ui

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapProgressText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Progress text while manual snap is being handled

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapErrorGeneralText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Error text when any error occured during snapping

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapErrorConnectionIssueText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Error text when any connection error occured during snapping

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapErrorNoResultsText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Error text when no result was found for manual snap

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: dismissButtonText
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Text for the dismiss button shown as rightBarButtonItem in the navigationBar. If nil, a systemItem .done is used

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: logoImage
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Logo Image. If nil, the default SnapOdds logo will be displayed

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: logoSize
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Logo size. If nil, a size of 140x41 is used

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsHeaderSeparatorColor
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Separator color between competitors header and best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsBackgroundColor
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Background color for the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsTitleLabel
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Title label for the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsSpreadTitleLabel
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Spread title label for the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsMoneyTitleLabel
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Money title label for the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsTotalTitleLabel
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Total title label for the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsCompetitorLabel
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Competitor label in the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsSportsBookBackgroundColor
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Background color for the sports book label in the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsSportsBookLabel
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Sports book label in the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsValueBackgroundColor
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Background color for the odds values in the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsValueLabel
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Odd value label for the odds in the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsTargetLabel
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Target value label for the odds in the best odds header

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: bestOddsSeparatorColor
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Separator color between odds in the best odds header

Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/s:19Snap.name: autosnapIntervalInSeconds
Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/s:19Snap.abstract: The minimum interval between automatic snap attempts in seconds; Defaults to 0.5

Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/s:19Snap.name: autosnapTimeoutDuration
Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/s:19Snap.abstract: The time interval after which automatic snapping stops when no results are found; Defaults to 30 seconds

Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/s:19Snap.name: quadrangleDetection
Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/s:19Snap.abstract: Perform quadrangle detection to improve snap result quality and accuracy. Defaults to true

Classes/SnapConfiguration.html.name: SnapConfiguration
Classes/SnapConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration to be passed when snapping. Allows you to specify behaviour of the snapping process

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfiguration
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Configuration for the Odds Display UI. See https://docs.snapodds.com/docs/mobile-sdk/ios/customization for details and mapping

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Configuration for the customizing the Snap UI

Classes/SnapscreenFingerprintResult.html.name: SnapscreenFingerprintResult
Classes/SnapscreenFingerprintResult.html.abstract: Represents a fingerprinting result of a captured image - intented to be used only by Snapscreen internally

Classes/SnapscreenQuadrangle.html.name: SnapscreenQuadrangle
Classes/SnapscreenQuadrangle.html.abstract: Represents a quadrangle on the screen that contains a search result - intented to be used only by Snapscreen internally

Classes/Snapscreen.html.name: Snapscreen
Classes/Snapscreen.html.abstract: Snapscreen offers the entry point for configuring the SDK

Classes/OddsResultsViewController.html.name: OddsResultsViewController
Classes/OddsResultsViewController.html.abstract: OddsResultsViewController offers the game odds presentation UI including all the loading and grouping logic to your application. Instantiate directly by passing the desired sport event and optional tv channel.

Classes/SnapViewController.html.name: SnapViewController
Classes/SnapViewController.html.abstract: SnapViewController offers the snapping UI including all the logic to your application. Instantiate directly by passing the desired SnapConfiguration and set an appropriate SnapscreenSnapDelegate to receive callbacks.
